data.title: Finn - Without a Trace (2002) Discussion
data.meta_description:
Hiya,

Does anyone know if Finn is actually Poppy's real son?? Looks just like her and her husband.

I've searched the cast listings but can't see his name down in any of them.

Thanks xx
data.text:
It's not her actual baby. They used a couple other babies to play Finn; her son Jackson was too big at the time since her actual pregnancy didn't coincide with the time they were filming Sam's pregnancy (they were off by like 6 months).

If this ain't love then how do we get out?

reply share

Looks just like her and her husband

----------------------------------------------

Also, Poppy Montgomery and Adam Kaufman are not married. She has indicated in interviews she isn't interested in being married.

reply share
